AI4LABOUR Secondment
The Objective
3
Design a recommendation/planning portal with AI 
techniques for the benefit of individuals, companies, 
policymakers and educational institutions form Europe 
and the entire world for helping their decision 
processes to reduce the possible negative AI-based 
impacts on the labour force.
